stories.title: Three AAPI founders building apps on the App Store that cultivate community

stories.text:
If I were to move away from GitHub, one of the services I'd miss the most is their integration with Dependabot.

Is there something similar to it on other providers (sourcehut, GitLab, Bitbucket, Codeberg, etc)?

To extend the discussion, I'm not sure if the vulnerability/security reports are part of Dependabot or something else, but they are also very useful.
stories.title: Ask HN: Dependabot-like service on other Git hosting providers?

stories.text: I want to use/have “biodynamic lighting” in my apartment. Anyone has any TIPs how to start with common lights from Philips or IKEA? Is there a light with API, som when I will calculate the sun position and light conditions to change light? Or just I am Over-complicating it and there is an out of the box solution? THX (my idea is to make an raspberryPI to manage lightning conditions) THX for TIPs.
stories.title: Ask HN: Any Tip for “Biodynamic Lighting”?
